font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 错综复杂的： complicated or secretive, having many parts or aspects that are usually interrelated
【例】 a bill to simplify the byzantine tax structure 一项试图简化繁琐税收制度的提案
【近】 convoluted, intricate, involved, labyrinthine, sophisticated, tangled
【反】 straightforward, plain, simple, uncomplicated 直截了当的，不复杂的
【记】 译音：拜占庭帝国
